summary: i18n Portuguese translations verified successfully - Report screen and 'Turno' translations working correctly

Portuguese locale (pt.json) correctly uses 'Turno' instead of 'Volta' for round-related translations
One minor fix applied: Changed 'All Equipment' to t('report.allBows') in getFilterSummary() function
i18n implementation is comprehensive across Home, Settings, Session Setup, Scoring, History, Report, and Bows screens

Report screen uses t() function throughout. One minor fix applied to getFilterSummary() to use t('report.allBows') instead of hardcoded 'All Equipment'. rca_of_the_issue.original_issue: Several menus and alerts remained in English after changing language to Portuguese
rca_of_the_issue.root_cause: Report screen (report.tsx) was not using t() translation function for all UI strings
rca_of_the_issue.fix_applied: Main agent added comprehensive t() calls throughout report.tsx and added translation keys to pt.json
rca_of_the_issue.verification: All report screen elements now display in Portuguese when language is set to 'pt'
rca_of_the_issue.additional_fix: Changed hardcoded 'All Equipment' to t('report.allBows') in getFilterSummary() function
